message: This "DriveTidy" program is amazing. Much better than CCleaner. Reclaimed so much space on C:\ that I thought programs will fail, all good!!
story: Meligy shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: DriveTidy
caption: fixkb.com
description: A disk cleanup utility that thoroughly scans your computer for unnecessary and invalid files no longer being used by the system freeing up disk space. It removes items that are missed by the built in Windows Disk Cleanup as well as other popular cleaning tools.

data.message:
It freed 7.69 GB here, and I already do a disk cleanup every month of so, with all that free space I can now install VS2013 Update 2 :D
(sadly it deleted IE's history as part of the "Temporary Internet Files", and I like keeping my browsing history :S)

I hated losing history as well. In my case I use Chrome all the time, so, it asked me to enter my password again and then eventually got my history back. My extensions and settings were not touched through the process still, which was good news, even though they could've been restored via sync anyway.
